name: leadsuccess-2fa-frontend
description: LeadSuccess 2FA Frontend for Azure Static Web Apps

scripts.build:frontend: echo 'Frontend build: copying files to dist' && mkdir -p dist && cp -r frontend/* dist/
scripts.start: echo 'This is a static frontend - serve the frontend folder'
scripts.dev: echo 'Use live-server or similar to serve frontend folder locally'
scripts.test: echo 'No tests specified for static frontend' && exit 0

author: LeadSuccess Team
